etomica.data.meter

Class MeterStructureFactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataSourceScalar
      • etomica.data.meter.MeterStructureFactor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource

    public class MeterStructureFactor
extends DataSourceScalar
    Meter for calculation of structure factor of a group of atoms based on a particular wave vector. The meter is initially constructed using the smallest reciprocal lattice vector as the wave vector and loops over all atoms in the box. GetData returns the square of the magnitude of the structure factor.
